INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE(CHTT_ROOM_NO, MSSAGE_SN, MSSAGE_WRITNG_EMPNO, MSSAGE_CN, MSSAGE_TY, MSSAGE_CREAT_DT) VALUES (#{chttRoomNo}, #{mssageSn}, #{mssageWritngEmpno}, #{mssageCn}, #{mssageTy}, #{mssageCreatDt})

INSERT ALL
INTO CHAT_EMP(CHTT_ROOM_NO, EMPL_NO) VALUES (#{chttRoomNo}, #{emplNo})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT MSSAGE_SN, CE.LAST_CNFIRM_NO, CASE WHEN CE.LAST_CNFIRM_NO >= MSSAGE_SN THEN '0' ELSE '1' END as READ_STR, M.MSSAGE_WRITNG_EMPNO, CE.CHTT_ROOM_NO, MSSAGE_CN, M.MSSAGE_CREAT_DT, MSSAGE_TY, E.EMPL_NO, EMPL_NM, E.PROFL_PHOTO_URL FROM CHAT_MESSAGE M LEFT JOIN CHAT_EMP CE ON(CE.CHTT_ROOM_NO = M.CHTT_ROOM_NO AND CE.EMPL_NO = M.MSSAGE_WRITNG_EMPNO) LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (M.MSSAGE_WRITNG_EMPNO = E.EMPL_NO) WHERE CE.CHTT_ROOM_NO = #{chttRoomNo} ORDER BY MSSAGE_SN

SELECT C.CHTT_ROOM_NO FROM (SELECT A.CHTT_ROOM_NO, A.EMPL_NO AS E1, B.EMPL_NO AS E2 FROM CHAT_EMP A LEFT JOIN CHAT_EMP B ON (A.CHTT_ROOM_NO = B.CHTT_ROOM_NO AND A.EMPL_NO != B.EMPL_NO) WHERE A.EMPL_NO = #{myEmplNo}) C WHERE C.E1 = #{myEmplNo} AND C.E2 = #{targetEmplNo}
